summary: Craftable version of Rizaun\'s Templar Armor
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a craftable version of Rizaun\'s Templar Armor. For the original ebony replacer mod, please visit the following:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1432

This armor mod adds a new unique Templar armor/weapons set into the game. This is not a replacer mod, but allows you to craft all the Templar items at the blacksmith. It does enforse that you have the correct perks to smith ebony armor, and all recipes are the same as the ebony items. All items are also upgradable as well (again assuming you have the right perks).

Latest Info: Added v1.2 with a fix for to allow mail version of the armor enchantable.

Recipes:
Templar Armor (Mail): 3 Leather Strips, 5 Ebony Ingot
Templar Armor: 3 Leather Strips, 5 Ebony Ingot
Templar Shield: 1 Leather Strips, 4 Ebony Ingot
Templar Helmet: 2 Leather Strips, 3 Ebony Ingot
Templar Gauntlets: 2 Leather Strips, 2 Ebony Ingot
Templar Boots: 2 Leather Strips, 3 Ebony Ingot
Templar Warhammer: 3 Leather Strips, 5 Ebony Ingot
Templar Sword: 1 Leather Strips, 2 Ebony Ingot
Templar Mace: 1 Leather Strips, 3 Ebony Ingot
Templar Greatsword: 3 Leather Strips, 5 Ebony Ingot
Templar Dagger: 1 Leather Strip, 1 Ebony Ingot
Templar Bow: 3 Ebony Ingot
Templar Battle Axe: 2 Leather Strips, 5 Ebony Ingot
Templar War Axe: 2 Leather Strips, 2 Ebony Ingot
Templar Arrow x25: 2 Firewood, 1 Ebony Ingot

Installation:
1.) Use NMM to download and install. This will automatically install in the correct location and activate the .esp file.
2.) Ensure plugins tab shows CraftableTemplar.esp checked and run the game.
- or -
1.) Extract all items into the skyrim data directory usually located at C:\\Program Files (x86)\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\
2.) Run SkyrimLauncher
3.) Click on \'Data Files\'
4.) Ensure that CraftableTemplar.esp is checked and click save.
5.) Play Skyrim

Uninstallation:
1.) Use NMM to disable the mod
- or -
1.) Remove CraftableTemplar.esp from skyrim Data directory.
2.) Remove the following directories from the skyrim data directory:
..\\meshes\\armor\\templar\\
..\\meshes\\armor\\templarmail\\
..\\meshes\\weapons\\templar\\
..\\textures\\armor\\templararmor\\
..\\textures\\armor\\templarmail\\
..\\textures\\weapons\\templar\\

Note on Heavy Armor Perks: There is a bug in the released Skyrim version that the +25% for wearing a whole Ebony Armor doesnÂ´t work. And since this is based on the ebony armor, it will likely suffer from the same bug. Source: http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Bugs_%28Skyrim%29

Updates:
v1.2 - Fixed unenchantable mail armor bug.
v1.0 - Initial Release

TODO:
-Look into why heavy armor perk doesn\'t work.
-Incorporate alternate no-cross texture into the mod.
-Look into separating the plate and mail into a heavy and light armor version respectively.
author: Raven42 Rizaun
